patterns: what can I use instead of egg in baking?
What to use instead of butter in cookies
What can I replace flour with?
Are there any alternatives of egg
I don't have curd, what can I use
responses: You can use applesauce, yogurt, or mashed bananas as substitutes for butter in baking.
For eggs, you can try flaxseed meal, chia seeds, or even a banana depending on the recipe.
Honey, maple syrup, or stevia can work well as sugar substitutes in certain recipes.
If you need to substitute flour, you can use almond flour, oat flour, whole wheat flour, a gluten-free flour blend, or a mixture of all-purpose flour and cornstarch to create a substitute.
